name: Splaboom
description:
Play as Plobo, a victim of Bomb Disease. Try to escape the Black and White City using various paint bombs to reveal invisible obstacles and platforms!

  1. Controls:
  2. WASD - move
  3. Space - jump
  4. Left Click - Throw Bomb (hold for longer throw)
  5. Middle Mouse/1-3- Switch Bomb Types
  6. Right Click - Detonate Cat Bomb

Credits!!!

Jaime Lopez: Programming, Level Design

Jordan Garza: Programming, Level Design, Sound Implementation

Karim Villaescusa F.: Concept Art, Illustration, Coloring

Sooyeon Yang: Programming, Animation, Coloring

Joshua De La Cruz: Writing, Animation
